pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multiobjective Genetic Algorithm for Variable Selection in Regression // Functions for exploring the best subsets in regression with a genetic algorithm. The package is much faster than methods relying on complete enumeration, and is suitable for data sets with large number of variables. For more information, see Sinha, Malo Kuosmanen (2015) doi:10.1080/10618600.2014.899236.
